text: Daniele Franco (born 7 June 1953) is an Italian economist, banker and civil servant. He was the Minister of Economy and Finance in the cabinet of Prime Minister Mario Draghi from 13 February 2021 to 22 October 2022. From 2020 until 2021, he was director-general of the Bank of Italy. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Italian economists Category:Italian bankers Category:Politicians from Veneto
title: Daniele Franco
